3 OrientationFeedForward::OrientationFeedForward()
4 {
5  d_pos_fixed_<<1,0,0;
6 
7  d_ori_fixed_.setIdentity();
8  this->current_ori_.setIdentity();
9  this->initial_ori_.setIdentity();
10  this->offset_rotation_.setIdentity();
11  this->offset_.setIdentity();
12  this->desired_ee_.setIdentity();
13 
14  this->offset_position_<<0.0,0.0,0.0;
15 
16 }
17 OrientationFeedForward::OrientationFeedForward(Position pos_off,Orientation ori_off):OrientationFeedForward()
18 {
19  this->setOffset(pos_off,ori_off);

21 void OrientationFeedForward::setOffset(Position pos_off, Orientation ori_off)
22 {
23  this->offset_.setIdentity();
24  this->offset_.translate(pos_off);
25  this->offset_.rotate(ori_off);
26 }

28 {
29  this->initial_ori_=initial_ori_;
30 }
31 void OrientationFeedForward::setOffset(Pose pose)
32 {
33  this->setOffset(Position(pose.block<3,1>(0,0)),Orientation(pose.block<4,1>(3,0)));
34 }

41 void OrientationFeedForward::setDesiredPose(Position position,Orientation orientation)
42 {
43  this->desired_ee_.setIdentity();
44  this->desired_ee_.translate(position);
45  this->desired_ee_.rotate(orientation);
46 }

48 void OrientationFeedForward::updateOrientation(double angle)
49 {
50  Eigen::Quaterniond ori= Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX())
51  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(0.0, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitY())
52  * Eigen::AngleAxisd(angle, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
53  this->updateOrientation(ori);
54 }
55 
56 void OrientationFeedForward::updateOrientation(Orientation ori)
57 {
58  this->current_.setIdentity();
59  this->current_.rotate(ori);
60  this->initial_ori_.inverse()*this->current_;
61 }
62 
63 OrientationFeedForward::Pose OrientationFeedForward::getPose()
64 {
65  Pose pose;
66  pose<<transformPosition(),transformOrientation().coeffs();
67  return pose;
68 }
69 OrientationFeedForward::Position OrientationFeedForward::transformPosition()
70 {
71  return (this->offset_.inverse()*this->current_.inverse()*this->desired_ee_).translation();
72 }
73 OrientationFeedForward::Orientation OrientationFeedForward::transformOrientation()
74 {
75  return Eigen::Quaterniond((this->offset_.inverse()*this->current_.inverse()*this->desired_ee_).rotation());
76 }
